duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with site leadership on quality and Customer Experience metrics, including the root cause analysis of problem areas Streamline logistics in the operation through the implementation of standard work and team leadership Support and commit to all safety programs and OSHA compliance to ensure a safe work environment for all associates Proactively identify and lead process improvement initiatives and Lean tools.
Lead a team of Transportation Associates, ensuring proper training and addressing their needs to optimize their performance.
Identify and lead process improvement initiatives, streamlining logistics operation and ensuring safety compliance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree, or 2+ years of Amazon (blue badge/FTE) experience
